abstract: Leading investment banks are considering joining Project Turquoise, the trading platform being created by seven financial firms to rival the London Stock Exchange. The banks developing the platform have received tentative requests — believed to be from ABN Amro and HSBC — to join forces, The Guardian reported.
lead_paragraph: Leading investment banks are considering joining Project Turquoise, the trading platform being created by seven financial firms to rival the London Stock Exchange. The banks developing the platform have received tentative requests — believed to be from ABN Amro and HSBC — to join forces, The Guardian reported.

headline.main: L.S.E. Rival Said to Lure More Investment Banks
